title: 10/05: Start or Sit (NFC); Beat the Waiver Wire (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Julian Edelman is back but is he back to being an automatic start? We start the show with a recap of IND-NE as we discuss Rob Gronkowski's slow start, Andrew Luck's pass attempts and much more ... An interesting RB option this week (13:04), news and notes (15:51), Beat the Waiver Wire (18:00) for Week 6 with several very enticing options, plus the Startometer (25:16) for guys like Sterling Shepard, Matt Breida and Devin Funchess ... MIN-PHI (28:00), GB-DET (38:01), WAS-NO (44:46), LAR-SEA (51:55), ARI-SF (56:32), NYG-CAR (59:00) ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
This episode is sponsored by www.ZipRecruiter.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
